Woe<S>1945</S> to the land<S>776</S> shadowing<S>6767</S> with wings<S>3671</S>, which is beyond<S>5676</S> the rivers<S>5104</S> of Ethiopia<S>3568</S>:
That sendeth<S>7971</S> ambassadors<S>6735</S> by the sea<S>3220</S>, even in vessels<S>3627</S> of bulrushes<S>1573</S> upon<S>6440</S> the waters<S>4325</S>, saying, Go<S>3212</S>, ye swift<S>7031</S> messengers<S>4397</S>, to a nation<S>1471</S> scattered<S>4900</S> and peeled<S>4178</S>, to a people<S>5971</S> terrible<S>3372</S> from their beginning hitherto<S>1973</S>; a nation<S>1471</S> meted out<S>6978</S> and trodden down<S>4001</S>, whose land<S>776</S> the rivers<S>5104</S> have spoiled<S>958</S>! <sup>scattered: or, outspread and polished</sup> <sup>meted: or, that meteth out and treadeth down: Heb. of line, line, and treading under foot</sup> <sup>have: or, despise</sup>
All ye inhabitants<S>3427</S> of the world<S>8398</S>, and dwellers<S>7931</S> on the earth<S>776</S>, see<S>7200</S> ye, when he lifteth up<S>5375</S> an ensign<S>5251</S> on the mountains<S>2022</S>; and when he bloweth<S>8628</S> a trumpet<S>7782</S>, hear<S>8085</S> ye.
For so<S>3541</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S> unto me, I will take my rest<S>8252</S>, and I will consider<S>5027</S> in my dwelling place<S>4349</S> like a clear<S>6703</S> heat<S>2527</S> upon herbs<S>216</S>, and like a cloud<S>5645</S> of dew<S>2919</S> in the heat<S>2527</S> of harvest<S>7105</S>. <sup>consider: or, regard my set dwelling</sup> <sup>upon: or, after rain</sup>
For afore<S>6440</S> the harvest<S>7105</S>, when the bud<S>6525</S> is perfect<S>8552</S>, and the sour grape<S>1155</S> is ripening<S>1580</S> in the flower<S>5328</S>, he shall both cut off<S>3772</S> the sprigs<S>2150</S> with pruning hooks<S>4211</S>, and take away<S>5493</S> and cut down<S>8456</S> the branches<S>5189</S>.
They shall be left<S>5800</S> together<S>3162</S> unto the fowls<S>5861</S> of the mountains<S>2022</S>, and to the beasts<S>929</S> of the earth<S>776</S>: and the fowls<S>5861</S> shall summer<S>6972</S> upon them, and all the beasts<S>929</S> of the earth<S>776</S> shall winter<S>2778</S> upon them.
In that time<S>6256</S> shall the present<S>7862</S> be brought<S>2986</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S> of a people<S>5971</S> scattered<S>4900</S> and peeled<S>4178</S>, and from a people<S>5971</S> terrible<S>3372</S> from their beginning hitherto<S>1973</S>; a nation<S>1471</S> meted out<S>6978</S> and trodden under foot<S>4001</S>, whose land<S>776</S> the rivers<S>5104</S> have spoiled<S>958</S>, to the place<S>4725</S> of the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>, the mount<S>2022</S> Zion<S>6726</S>. <sup>scattered: or, outspread and polished</sup>
